mapper.select: Call CUQARC101_PROCESS_RESICONT( #{request.metadata.json, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=INOUT}, #{request.metadata.library, jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=OUT}, #{request.accountTable, jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=OUT}, #{request.siteTable, jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=OUT}, #{request.containerTable, jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=OUT}, #{request.rateTable, jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=OUT}, #{request.routeTable, jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=OUT}, #{request.errorCode,jdbcType=CHAR,mode=OUT}, #{request.errorMessage,jdbcType=CHAR,mode=OUT} )

CALL CUQACQ101_CSWEB_INSERT_PROCESS (#{metadata, jdbcType=CLOB, mode=IN}, #{tableData, jdbcType=CLOB, mode=IN}, #{result.sqlState,jdbcType=CHAR,mode=OUT}, #{result.errorMessage,jdbcType=CHAR,mode=OUT})

Call CUQOMAAI13_UPLOAD_SCHEDULE( #{request.requestedUser, jdbcType=CHAR, mode=IN}, #{request.projectId, jdbcType=CHAR, mode=IN}, #{request.action, jdbcType=CHAR, mode=IN}, #{request.scheduleDate, jdbcType=CHAR, mode=INOUT}, #{request.scheduleTime, jdbcType=CHAR, mode=INOUT}, #{request.returnStatus,jdbcType=CHAR,mode=OUT}, #{request.returnErrorMsg,jdbcType=CHAR,mode=OUT} )
